title: REALLY BAD PING ISSUES
body: So, Riot i was wondering i wanna get a straight forward answer I need serious help I have been playing your game for 4 years now. I had a few here or there moments with ping nothing like this.. I load into a game 125 ping okay.. weird. i get into the game moving my champion then it shoots all the way up to 1500 even 1900 ping that is insane. Second i was thinking okay maybe its me ill make sure before I point fingers at you. So I tested my speed its fine okay weird just make sure it wasn't a "bad game". So i try it again load in 125 at loading screen get into the game 1500 starting off the bat now I am getting mad so all day today this started yesterday my ping rose really really high. Like the highest i seen was maybe 500 ms before this?? So i need serious help I know its not a formal way to ask but since I play your game a lot and want to keep playing so help me fix this issue. Is it the new patch?? or legacy client also my Ip is bugged idk if that new or old. Andddddd... If i have to can a Riot employee message me on my client to guide me or something because this is very public anyways need Help pls. If you have send a ticket but please be ready to explain why this is happening.  @riotgames pls!!

replies.body: Already sent a ticket at the moment I am Fixing my Clinet thing so idk ill keep you posted.

It looks like you've already received a response from one of our tech agents, last I checked your ticket. Since our tech agents have access to your system logs, it will be easier for your assigned specialist to help from here out. ^.^
